title: Fixed issues
content:
This release fixes the following issues:
Category Issue ID Description
Service Management OCTCR19XW2737033

When a service, support, or HR support request that includes an ENTITY_LINK field is added to the Service Portal cart, the value entered for the field while filling out the request is not saved. If the request is submitted directly instead of being added to the cart, the field value is saved correctly.

Service Management

 OCTCR19XW2726283 The cart does not clear after submitting a single request.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2716179 Portal category tile with an external URL displays the a warning when the external domain application setting is set to asterisk *.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2718086 Possible to create multiple active approval delegate.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2713450 Sorting in Inbox is not working.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2708972 The asterisk next to a View name which indicates that it has been modified does not work correctly.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2648992 Portal inserts old search words into the Description of a new Request.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2724391 The maas_error.log contains error: ERR wrong number of arguments for sadd command.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2719449 In new Rich Text Editor content not saved in some cases.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2518919 Switching the menu clears changes in previous menu.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2714532
Images become very small in the new Rich Text editor.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2724627 Cursor resets to the start of the rich text field after typing a CI#.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2725615 Editing table data in Froala Rich Text Editor does not save.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2732215 After upgrading to 25.4 and 25.4.1 REST Executor 1.0 REST API call fails with a 401 Unauthorized error.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2583473 In JATO mode the Request preview panel view does not load when the Request has 15-20 custom entity_link fields to Person.
Service Management OCTCR19XW2730841 Multi-select inputs appear blank after adding new elements.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2713736 In new Rich Text Editor HTML, the pasted content does not save in some cases.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2519306 Tenant migration to one-tier tenancy mode was not performed after the upgrade.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2527092 When integrating O365 email through Studio to create a Support Request, the Label field in execution history is empty for some entries.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2714720 Rest Executor 2.0 is not working on OPB Agent.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2720867 SMA-SM Portal recent Offering sidebar lists Offerings that are inactive.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2712245 Different Behavior of entity_link Field Type in Service Portal Between Service Management 24.2 and 24.3.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2722260 The calendar screen displays incorrectly when selecting a date on the service portal.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2721097 Submit button must be clicked twice to create a request in the Service Portal.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2725139 Incorrect validation errors in Approval task pop-up.
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2715294 Service Portal quick navigation pop-up menu displays disabled features.
Cloud Management OCTCR19XW2713714 Regex validation rule does not work for Aggregated Offerings.
Cloud Management OCTCR19XW2717721 Service instance search does not work.
